basic.floral_language:
Lagerstroemia indica
Floriography: happy, beautiful, sympathy.
Leaves are inverse oval, green. Wrinkle flowers gracefully cluster atop of stem. Widely cultivated in yards, gardens and pots for its long flowering duration.
The plant grows best with plenty of sunlight, partial shade tolerant. It blooms in June to September and flower lasts for three to four weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period June-September, viewing period 3-4 weeks
basic.color: Flower color red, dark pink, purple, white

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and summer, except winter in dormancy
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
